title: Gilmore Girls Alumni
description: A look at the cast members that gained significant fame after Gilmore Girls.

data.name: Melissa McCarthy
data.description: Appearing in all but one episode of the Gilmore Girls, Melissa went on to win an Emmy in 2011 for [Mike & Molly](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1608180/) and was [the third highest paid actress of 2015](http://www.etonline.com/news/170344_jennifer_lawrence_scarlett_johansson_melissa_mccarthy_top_world_highest_paid_actresses_list/).

data.name: Jared Padalecki
data.description: Rory's first boyfriend left the show to star in [Supernatural](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0460681/) which is entering its 11th season as well as the lead role in 2009's [Friday the 13th](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0758746/).

data.name: Matt Czuchry
data.description: After playing Logan Huntzberger, Matt starred in the raunchy comedy [I Hope They Server Beer in Hell](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1220628/) before landing a starring role in CBS's [The Good Wife](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1442462/) which is in its 7th season.

data.name: Todd Lowe
data.description: Lane's bandmate and eventual husband went south to Louisiana to play Sookie's co-worker and friend in 66 of [True Blood's](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0844441/) 80 episodes.

data.name: Milo Ventimiglia
data.description: Luke's moody nephew went on to star in the hugely popular [Heroes](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0813715/) and Sylvester Stallone's son in [Rocky Balboa](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0479143/).

data.name: Vanessa Marano
data.description: Luke's daughter currently stars in ABC Family's [Switched at Birth](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1758772/) appearing in all 85 episodes.

data.name: Chad Michael Murray
data.description: Chad abruptly left Gilmore Girls when he received the lead role in [One Tree Hill](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0368530/) lasting 9 seasons.

data.name: Adam Brody
data.description: Lane's love interest also left after receiving a starring role in another TV show: [The OC](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0362359/) which aired 92 episodes.

data.name: Arielle Kebbel
data.description: Dean's rebound and eventual wife went on to star in several movies including [John Tucker Must Die](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0455967/) and [The Uninvited](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0815245/) before starring as The Rock's girlfriend in HBO's [Ballers](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2891574/).

data.name: Krysten Ritter
data.description: After leaving Yale and the Gilmore Girls, Krysten become Jesse Pinkman's girlfriend on [Breaking Bad](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0903747/) before landing the starring role in ABC's [Don't Trust the B in Apt 23](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1819509/).

data.name: Riki Lindhome
data.description: Playing a classmate of Rory's at Yale, Riki went to co-create and star in IFC's [Garfunkel & Oates](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2276413/) and Comedy Central's [Another Period](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3593432/).

data.name: Danny Pudi
data.description: Three years after working in the newsroom at Yale with Rory, Danny was casted as Abed in NBC's [Community](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1439629/), recently revived by Yahoo! Screen.

data.name: Billy Burke
data.description: Playing Lorelai's love interest, Billy later starred as Bella's dad in the [Twilight Series](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1099212/) and won the lead role in NBC's [Revolution](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2070791/) and CBS's [Zoo](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3250026/).

data.name: Nick Offerman
data.description: Four years before being cast as Ron Swanson in NBC's [Parks and Recreation](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1266020/), Nick played Sookie's lazy brother-in-law.

data.name: Jamie Babbit
data.description: Jamie went on to direct 9 episodes of [Drop Dead Diva](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1280822/) and co-executive produce/direct FX's [Married](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2786956/).

data.name: Lee Shallat Chemel
data.description: Lee has directed an amazing 52 of 144 episodes of ABC's [The Middle](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1442464/), a sweet family sitcom.

data.name: Kenny Ortega
data.description: Kenny is now a Disney Channel favorite, directing [High School Musical](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0475293/), [High School Musical 2](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0810900/), and the recently aired [The Descendants](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3440298/).

data.name: Daniel Palladino
data.description: Husband to Gilmore Girls' creator [Amy Sherman-Palladino](http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0792371/), Daniel is one of many connections to [Family Guy](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0182576/) including Seth McFarland's guest appearance at Lorelei's graduation.

data.name: Lesli Linka Glatter
data.description: Directing Gilmore Girls' pilot along with several more early episodes, Lesli then directed 8 episodes of [The West Wing](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0200276/), 6 episodes of [Mad Men](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0804503/), and 12 episodes of [Homeland](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1796960/).

data.name: Gail Mancuso
data.description: Also directing several early episodes, Gail began directing episodes of [Scrubs](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0285403/) (9 episodes), [30 Rock](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0496424/) (8 episodes) before winning two Emmys while directing 19 episodes of [Modern Family](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1442437/).
